myapp.utils module¶

myapp.utils.logger = <RootLogger root (WARNING)>¶

The function generates a DataFrame that include SKP4, number of positions, number of matching BO in same Municipality, distance of BO, and travel for BO

myapp.utils.select_positions(mer, bo_id_upravne_enote, id_distance_time)[source]¶

key, values = zip(*id_distance_time[bo_id_upravne_enote].items()) values = np.array(values) key = np.array(key) wh = mer.IDupEnote.isin(key[np.array(values) < distance]) xx = mer.loc[wh,[‘SKP-4’,’weight_num’,’IDupEnote’,’number of BO’]] dist = mer[wh].apply(lambda x: id_distance[x.IDupEnote][64],axis=1) xx[‘distance’] = dist
